content: craftivist no ice doodle the no ice doodle is inspired by our core values - that we stand with our immigrant need some inspo friends and neighbors and that we support the abolition of ice the no ice motifs includes a check out example single chart of an ice cube with a red slash over it ravelry projects here this pattern is part of ourcraftivist doodle series which includes designs that
